entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low plus 2.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
